text: news is coming in to us from Istanbul of
gunfire being heard and of ambulances
heading to the site of the dome at
battery palace which is in the besiktas
district of istanbul down by the
Bosphorus a a very famous museum
essentially now but it was a part of the
Ottoman Empire so a place where
certainly tourists would go the word we
have at the moment is that ambulance has
been sent down into the area of the
entrance to the doma Bochy Palace it's a
large building right on the water front
of the Bosphorus and there have been
reports of gunfire being heard in and
around the dome abacha Palace obviously
as we pull together more details on that
we will keep you apprised here on BBC
world news but as we understand it there
are ambulances being sent down after
gunshots were heard at the dome abacha
palace in the Bacchic test district of
istanbul right down on the waterfront of
the Bosphorus
